name: Comradery
shortDescription: No captain flies alone. You share your achievements with a trusted partner, as your only equal.

name: High Value Target
shortDescription: Some factions are displeased with your continued influence on the Sector.

name: Force in numbers
shortDescription: You are renowned across the Sector for your unique wolfpack fleet stratagem.

name: Personal Army
shortDescription: Your experience as a military official leaves you uniquely equipped to face the challenges of a post-collapse society.

name: Neural Shard
shortDescription: You salvaged an experimental neural device, capable of creating a one-man army mapped to the tendrils of your psyche.

name: Zero Day Exploit
shortDescription: Years spent tinkering with technology led to the discovery of a root exploit in guidance systems no one else is aware of.
